website_summaries.verdict: Consumers across generations love the Chuck Taylor All Star’s timeless flair that goes well with every outfit there is. It is comfortable, breathable, affordable, and classic. This Seasonal Colors Low Top edition is no different.The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Seasonal Colors Low Top shoe is just like your typical oxford All Stars but comes in seasonal, limited-run fall colorways. However, like typical Chucks, it lacks ankle and arch support due to its construction.
pros: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Seasonal Colors Low Top is available in new seasonal colorways
Its budget-friendly price is a plus for many buyers
A couple of reviewers said that they get lots of compliments wherever they go because of this shoe
Many reviewers stated that they are pleased that their shoes came as expected and as described online
Loyal All Star users were glad that this shoe fits the same way as any other All Stars they’ve owned
A couple of users commented that they loved the next-to-nothing feel of this low top
The flat sole of this sneaker makes it a great weightlifting shoe, according to some reviewers
The timeless look of the All Star Seasonal Colors is perfect for any outfit, said many buyers
Numerous reviewers applauded the quality and durability of this Converse shoe
Some stated that their pairs lasted for years
The canvas material is breathable, which is a desirable feature for most buyers
cons: Although not a major issue, many note this shoe's lack of arch support

customer_reviews.title: So cute but big... go at least a half size down
customer_reviews.text: The box was destroyed when it arrived. That’s always disappointing... the amazon bag it came in was not damaged just the converse box. The color is true. I love the color. I am a true size 9.5... Nike to Michael Kors THESE ARE A 10.5 at least... the label says women’s 9.5/ men’s 7.5 I’m sending these back in hopes of getting the correct size. There were none in my size...🥺💔
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Parents... seriously

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Huge hassle but it is what it is. Will order again once this insanity of “corona” ends and you can actually speak with a representative
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love em! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: As described. I added gel shoe pad for more comfort, only because I’m on my feet 24/7. Great price. Yes they are real.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! I bought size 9 because that is my size and they fit just as expected. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Molly Avery Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great seller & great product!!  We just miscalculated the size.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery & product were perfect. Just needed a larger size. We ordered twice before & they ran larger than expected. We went a little too small this time I guess.
customer_reviews.author: wahoogirl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! I ordered an 8.5 because they were cheaper with my prime. I should have got my normal size, an 8, but I can just wear a thicker pair of socks and they will be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11 1/2 to 12 and the 11 1/2 is big wearable but big
customer_reviews.author: Carl R.

customer_reviews.title: One time use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a wedding. A little too big, too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Durfee

customer_reviews.title: Order a full size larger than you think you need
customer_reviews.text: these were too small and now I will have to return them and my kid wont get to wear them for Christmas :/
customer_reviews.author: John Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sneaker . Purchased them in yellow. Nice color. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C.

customer_reviews.title: Consider downsizing when ordering these.
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful. The shoe seems closer to a Size 8 than a 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews regarding sizes ( running large or small).
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my order. Researched sizes and reviews to make my decision. Totally Satisfied. !!!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Me. King

product_meta.title: Converse Unisex Adults Chuck Taylor All Star 2019 Seasonal Low Top Sneaker
product_meta.description: The laidback legend since ’57. The Chuck Taylor All Star Low Top sneaker is the iconic low-cut. Essential elements like an Ortholite insole and canvas upper keep it comfortable. You got it.
feature_bullets: Ortholite insole helps keep it comfortable
